hibernate-mapping.query: select taskAssignment from omis.task.domain.TaskAssignment taskAssignment where taskAssignment.task = :task and taskAssignment.assigneeAccount = :assigneeAccount and taskAssignment.assignedDate = :assignedDate

select taskAssignment from omis.task.domain.TaskAssignment taskAssignment where taskAssignment.task = :task and taskAssignment.assigneeAccount = :assigneeAccount and taskAssignment.assignedDate = :assignedDate and taskAssignment not in (:excludedTaskAssignments)
select taskAssignment from omis.task.domain.TaskAssignment taskAssignment where taskAssignment.task = :task order by taskAssignment.assignedDate, taskAssignment.assigneeAccount.username
